item.description:
EVENT CANCELLED. POSTEPONED TO NEXT MONTH!!

 

-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*
PLEASE REGISTER FOR THIS EVENT
-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*-----*

Do you love delicious food and fine dining?

Then join our monthly dining club to check out all the amazing restaurants the greater Boston area has to offer!

Since we are limiting the number of people to keep it small and intimate please REGISTER for this event by 7/09. Space is limited to 12 people and MEMBERS will be given a preference. So please register ASAP.

NO WALK-INS. DEADLINE TO REGISTER 12PM ON WEDS.

This month we explore fine FRENCH cuisine at MISTRAL BISTRO in Boston.

A great setting to make new friends!! Check out their website at http://www.mistralbistro.com/

Registration Fee: $0 for members $5 for non-members

Registration link: http://www.membership.netip.org/assnfe/ev.asp?ID=181

Signup for membership at: http://na.netip.org/members/join

To know more about us visit www.netsapboston.org
item.name: Circle of Friends Monthly Dinner - CANCELLED
